Function reference

geom_glowpath() geom_glowline() geom_glowstep()
Connect Observations
geom_glowpoint()
Points
geom_shadowpath() geom_shadowline() geom_shadowstep()
Connect Observations
geom_shadowpoint()
Points
scale_shadowcolour_brewer() scale_shadowcolour_distiller() scale_shadowcolour_fermenter()
Sequential, diverging and qualitative colour scales from colorbrewer.org
scale_shadowcolour_hue() scale_shadowcolour_discrete()
Evenly spaced colours for discrete data
scale_shadowcolour_steps() scale_shadowcolour_steps2() scale_shadowcolour_stepsn()
Binned gradient colour scales
scale_shadowcolour_continuous() scale_shadowcolour_binned()
Continuous and binned colour scales
scale_shadowcolour_gradient() scale_shadowcolour_gradient2() scale_shadowcolour_gradientn() scale_shadowcolour_datetime() scale_shadowcolour_date()
Gradient colour scales
scale_shadowcolour_grey()
Sequential grey colour scales
scale_shadowcolour_identity()
Use values without scaling
scale_shadowcolour_manual()
Create your own discrete scale
scale_shadowcolour_viridis_d() scale_shadowcolour_viridis_c() scale_shadowcolour_viridis_b() scale_shadowcolour_ordinal()
Viridis colour scales from viridisLite
